secret_rule: Pairs of items can be brought to the picnic if they are both objects typically found in a school.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "pencil" and "notebook".

Based on the examples "pencil" and "notebook," a possible rule could be that you can bring any item related to writing or school supplies. These two items are commonly found in a classroom and are used for writing or note-taking activities. Therefore, the rule might be that you can bring items that are related to writing or educational tools.
